title: PREFACE

book.title: The Young Book Agent or Frank Hardy's Road to Success
book.description: 简介： Many years ago the author of the present volume resolved to write a long series of books describing various phases of village and city life, taking up in their turn the struggles of the bootblacks, the newsboys, the young peddlers, the street musicia...
